ShardKey ShardKey Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.SqlDatabase.ElasticScale.ShardManagement
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.SqlDatabase.ElasticScale.Client.dll

Shard key value. Wraps the type and value and allows normalization/denormalization for serialization.

Edit

In this Article
